projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description: In charge of the development of an e-commerce. Development of the UX/UI for the NLR Electric system. Implementation of an inventory control system and a scraping module. Management of customer and employee authentication, recording of sales made by customers and purchases by the company

projects.title: Shopping Tickets for Movies
projects.description: This was a university project where we had to simulate how movie ticket purchases work. The system included real-time seat selection, displaying available, occupied, and selected seats dynamically. It was a great opportunity to apply frontend and backend integration while ensuring a smooth user experience.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcasing projects, skills and contact information.

projects.title: Netflix Type Website
projects.description: This is a personal project that uses an external database to display featured movies and a wide range of films to the user. The platform offers an intuitive and visually appealing interface, allowing users to explore and discover movies effortlessly.

projects.title: Tattoo Website
projects.description: This is a personal project where users can explore tattoo designs created by various artists. The platform allows users to book appointments with their preferred tattoo artist, offering a seamless and intuitive experience. It combines modern design with robust functionality to connect tattoo enthusiasts with talented artists.

projects.title: ChatBot Telegram
projects.description: This was a university project where users could interact with a chatbot to ask questions about blockchain technology and explore interesting facts about it. The chatbot provided clear and concise answers, making it an educational and engaging tool for learning about blockchain concepts and curiosities.
